name: Last Man Survival Battle Game
description:
Call of Secret Army Duty - Final Survival Battle is the last man standing survival FPS game and Battle Royale lovers. This high-tension unknown battleground is located in a downtown where players must use strategy and tactic to locate weapons and resources while defeating everyone and staying alive any way possible.


Last Man Survival Battle Game features:
- Realistic Environment.
- Challenging missions
- Realistic and latest models of guns
- Nonstop action zombie frontier war simulation
- Interesting back sound and compatible user interface
